strings.Value: [Give Melianse the feather tokens] "There. Will you free the hostages now?"
[Hug Melianse] "Of course we can be friends!"
[Attack Melianse] "Dealing with you was a mistake. Die!"
[Attack the lumberjacks] "I'll get rid of them for you, once and for all."
"Where can I find the feather tokens, again?"
[Use dispel magic to free the hostages] "I've lifted the enchantment! You're free!"
"Well? You have my feather tokens yet?"
"I used to think all you people were dumb and nasty, but you don't seem so bad. Let's be friends!"

{n}Sobbing, the nixie looks at the bloody bodies splayed at her feet.{/n} "I just... I just wanted to scare them! So they'd leave me and my trees alone! And you... you... I hate you, you dumb jumbos! All of you! All you know how to do is fight!" {n}Melianse dives into the lake, still crying.{/n}
{n}Chuckling, the fey pushes you away.{/n} "Eeewwww, what are you doing? Stop that, come on! Here, just take this, and hold off on that cuddly stuff, all right?"

{n}Melianse giggles.{/n} "You people are so silly. Can't keep a thing in your heads! Go find my cousin, a dryad named Tiressia who lives in the {g|Narlmarches}Narlmarches{/g}. She can make some of those feather tokens. Or just run off to one of the mages living in the swamps. They usually collect those. Maybe they'll be in charitable mood to share!"
"Make sure you don't get lost! You people never seem to watch where you put your feet."
"Whaaat?!" {n}The nixie stomps her dainty foot.{/n} "So that's the way you want it? Fine, I'll show you!"
"All right, you big dunces, you may go... But bring me the feathers, no cheating!"
"Awww, that's more like it! Go on, hostages â€” I won't hold you back anymore!"
